I'm gonna wait and see if BD Armory gets an update before releasing my plane. My simulated matches with the latest version have all been stalemates ending in mid-air collisions due to the weapon systems being totally ineffective:

AIM-9 Sidewinder: defeated by a few flares dispensers.

AIM-120: out-maneuvered. None of the planes I tested with had chaff or ECM Jammers and yet the AIM-120's never got a hit.

Machine guns: pilot too drunk to aim. Best approach may be to spam .50-cal turrets and slightly rotate each gun to create a shotgun effect.
